Candidates revealed as campaigning opens | YUSU Elections 2016

08/02/2016

This year there are seven candidates standing for YUSU President

Image by

By undefined undefined

As campaigning opens, Nouse can reveal the full list of candidates for all Full and Part Time Officer positions in 2016's YUSU Elections. This year there are seven people contesting the position of YUSU President, including the current YUSU Women's Officer Ananna Zaman, Habib Nassar, the President of Palestinian Solidarity Society, former Vice Chairman of York Tories Oliver Wilson, and Nouse's own Comment Editor Ciaran Morrissey. The position of Activities Officer will be a six way contest. The role of Community and Wellbeing Officer will be a three person race between Alcuin Chair Dom Smithies, current LGBTQ Officer Jack Chadwick, and former Secretary of Fetsoc Rosario Neyra. Thomas Ron re-stands for his current position as Academic Officer, challenged by Tamaki Laycock and Lisseth Inza Flores. York Sport President is contested by five, including the Presidents of the University's Boxing and American Football Clubs. More information, including interviews with the candidates and Candidate Profiles, can be found on Nouse's Elections mini-site. The full list of candidates can be read below. Campaigning and voting is now open, and runs until Friday Week 7 (19th Feb) at 5pm, with results announced on Sunday 21st Feb. Students can vote for candidates in all positions here.

Candidates for YUSU President

Oliver Wilson JJ Wilson Habib Nassar Ananna Zaman Millie Beach Connor Middleton Ciaran Morrissey

Candidates for Student Activities Officer

Alex Lusty Charlie Watkins Lucas North Heather Kelly Dominic Elhert Golfo Migos

Candidates for Academic Officer

Thomas Ron Tamaki Laycock Lisseth Inza Flores

Candidates for Community and Wellbeing Officer

Dom Smithies Jack Chadwick Rosario Neyra

Candidates for York Sport President

Isaac Beevor Aaron Dougherty Beth Cash Stephen Bates

Candidates for Women's Officer

Sally Sadik Joanie Hutchinson-Ross & Rosie Rhodes Mia Shantana Chaudhuri-Julyan & Lucy Elizabeth Robinson

Candidates for International Officer

Roberto Avelar

Candidates for Environment and Ethics Officer

Katie Smith & Ben Walker Benjamin Wright & Bethan Laughlin Robert Gordon & Ella Parker

Candidates for BME Officer

Deborah Daniel Sophie Flinders & Gabriella Obeng Nyarko

Candidates for LGBTQ Officer

Ashley Reed & Jaz Millar Andrew Macauley

Candidates for Disabled Students' Officer

Alexander Wray Samuel Linley

Mature Students' Officer

Kevin Claxton & Leah Armstrong

Candidates for RAG Officer

Roz Walton

Candidates for Volunteering Officer

Ellie Meagher & Hannah Higgs Abigail Fedorovsky

Candidates for Policy Coordinator

James Humpish

Candidates for Faculty Rep (Arts and Humanities)

Jay Edevane Marina Lewis

Candidates for Faculty Reps (Sciences)

Matthew Brummitt Sarah Williams Thomas Shutt

Candidates for Faculty Reps (Social Sciences)

Michael Watkins Matthew Hodges
